pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extension to 'spatstat' for Large Datasets on a Linear Network // Extension to the 'spatstat' package, for analysing large datasets of spatial points on a network. Provides a memory- efficient algorithm for computing the geometrically-corrected K function, described in S. Rakshit, A. Baddeley and G. Nair (2019) doi:10.18637/jss.v090.i01
